mapper.insert: insert into slip_detail (slipdetailno, status, price, clientcard, slipnumber, establishcode) values (#{slipdetailno},#{status},#{price},#{clientcard},#{slipnumber},#{establishcode})
mapper.select: select slipdetailno, status, price, clientcard, slipnumber, establishcode from slip_detail
select slipdetailno, status, price, clientcard, slipnumber, establishcode from slip_detail where slipdetailno = #{slipdetailno}
